Text: Uko̩o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ de̩. E̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ i che;
ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, o̩mo̩ ama ki kpa e̩wñ iche̩be̩ abi eje̩; kʼama ki dʼe̩bie̩-wñ tafio̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka.
I ako ula-wñ chaka wa, otihi-wñ ki yoyo kpai aga-wñ kʼi bʼifu-wñ ma
kpai ekpili-wñ meji manyʼula ki dʼo̩la-wñ, e-ki me̩ru ago-wñ, kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ kʼi abu manyʼekpili-wñ;
atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi mud e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ku ma du wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una. Iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩, i che.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef amatama aje̩ e-le̩; ma aje̩ ef uña kiafo̩; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Alu kʼiche̩bo̩ adure de̩ abe̩le̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ de̩; uko̩-o̩la e̩wñ meji le̩ chʼokate; atama kʼi nʼache e̩wñ e̩boma, owñ le̩ ane̩.
Oñ atama ki adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e̩ne̩ du wa, atama le̩ ane̩ año̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼi duwa le̩.
E̩wñ ele du ku ma ro̩ ef igbeli kpai e-ku ma de̩ ef ucha abe̩k anade, atama ki adʼu wa ane̩ e-le̩.
E̩wñ ele du dagba kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, dagba kʼi chʼe-e̩gbe̩, amo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chaka ane̩, alu kʼoka ne̩ ekeji ane̩.
Uko̩o̩la, alu ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼone̩ aduwa ñwu Jihofa.

I la che̩wñ kʼi dʼu wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ ugwa, mak i ki ñʼakʼakala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n e-kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu kpai o̩kpukpulu ku ma bʼekpo tʼoji kpai akala ku ma nʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ che kʼi fʼekpo ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la wa manyʼe̩wñ ugwa ki adu wa le̩.
I akʼakala kʼi chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ kʼo̩jo̩wu dʼo̩ wa manyʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ugwa-wñ.
Ab i fʼabe̩i che i adʼo̩ko̩ke̩ kwef e̩wñ O̩jo̩ okoke kʼi ko wa le̩ chʼe̩wñ edu nyʼate̩ ñwu Jihofa; atama kʼi afiʼe̩bie̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ anʼe-le̩.
Ma la aje̩ e̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-ure̩do̩ kʼi kpa tod ugwa o̩jo̩ kʼi du e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa le̩; i atʼe-du no̩ nyʼodudu n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ le̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼi doji, abe̩k e̩wñ ki gʼe̩do̩la-wñ du wa, maku ma aje̩ o̩jo̩ kʼi dʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-wñ wa le̩, ma la aje̩ e̩bo̩bo̩-wñ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ,
ama e̩la iche̩bo̩ le̩ ki bo̩ nyʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ma agʼujo ef una.
I la che̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ je̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ re i anyʼo̩ eju n, i anʼile ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼu wa n; e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ i che̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du ki je̩ anʼudu-wñ.
Ma ajʼe̩la du ki kado e̩wñ e̩daji n; ma agu e-le̩ jo ef una. E̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ aje̩ e̩la-wñ.
Ama onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ daji kʼi fʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ Jihofa je̩, ma ki kʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼabo-wñ te̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ e̩daji kwokadʼone̩, dagba kʼi chʼe̩daji e-one̩ dagba kʼi chʼe̩daji e-e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, abe̩k e̩wñ elifo̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu du ki achʼone̩ ire̩, tak i fʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ e-Jihofa je̩, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼabo-wñ te̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Me̩ ki je̩ ula du n, tʼe-o̩kokuno̩, tʼe-ala, tʼe-ewo.
Me̩ neke dʼula e̩la ki leku, kpai ula e̩la kʼame̩la fufana, che e̩wñ omune̩ ojoji du; i muda nʼugbo du ku me̩ aje̩ n.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi je̩ ula e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼi dʼef ame̩la ku ma du che Jihofa lugbo una, onugo e̩ne̩ du ki je̩, ma ako̩da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Alu du ki de̩ ugbo du ku me̩ jo̩ me̩ ki je̩ e̩bie̩ n dagba i chʼe-e̩we̩, dagba kʼi chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki dʼef unyi-me̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼe̩bie̩ je̩, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ ki adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa ñwu Jihofa, ki kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa ñwu Jihofa kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ.
E̩ne̩ le̩ anʼo̩wo̩-wñ onugo kʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una; i akʼula manyʼache̩do̩-wñ wa, todu ku ma dʼache̩do̩ le̩ wa miejo, kʼi mud e̩wñ eduwa miejo o̩gba Jihofa.
Atama la agu ula-wñ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, ache̩do̩-wñ muda chʼe-Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ.
Me̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ ñw atama ki mud e̩wñ edu nyʼate̩ ñw u, kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ku me̩ kpa ñw u;
o̩ma Aro̩n ki dʼe̩bie̩ kpai ula iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩ wa anʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ e̩la le̩ ki chʼukpe̩ e-wñ.

Todu omi mʼache̩do̩ e-emiejo kpai o̩wo̩ ku ma du nyʼate̩ le̩ gba ugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ku ma che, oñ u mʼu ko ñw Aro̩n atama kpai amo̩ma-wñ, kʼi mud ukpe̩ e-ma kwugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l ogbegbele̩.
E-le̩ mud ukpe̩ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ef e̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, o̩jo̩ kʼi bʼekpo tʼuma o̩la kʼi la ko ma jo̩ ku ma che e̩wñ amatama ñwu Jihofa;
Jihofa ñwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma kʼe-le̩ ñwu ma, o̩jo̩ kʼi fʼekpo ba tʼuma o̩la le̩. Ukpe̩ e-ma i che gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-ma.
Uko̩o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e-e̩wñ ele kpai e-iche̩bo̩ adure kpai iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ kpʼe-e̩wñ eko nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ kpai iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩;
owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s oj uwo Sainai o̩jo̩ kʼi ñwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma ki kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma wa ñwu Jihofa aje̩tachi Sainai le̩.
